languages.text: The Arbitrator can be placed in a cell adjacent to an enemy during the positioning phase before the combat.

languages.text: During the tactical phase, the Arbitrator can be placed in a cell adjacent to an enemy.
languages.original_text: Во время фазы расстановки арбитр может быть помещен на клетку, соседнюю с врагом.
